The Hermetic

As Above, So Below

Welcome. We're thrilled you're here.

The Hermetic Flight is the world's first aerial tarot deck—78 cards featuring 21 real aerial performers embodying the archetypes of tarot through movement.

"If you've ever wanted to experience divination as something you feel in your body, not just contemplate in your mind, this deck is for you."

❖

Launch Trajectory

Kickstarter: January 11th, 2026

We'd love your input before we launch. Your feedback directly influences the final product and future companion offerings. We're genuinely listening.

The 5-Question Journey

1

Your Real Questions

Share your real questions and challenges about tarot divination. Deirdre (the deck's creator) personally reads and responds to every answer.

2-3

Tailored Content

Based on your experience level with aerial arts and tarot, we'll send you content that actually matches where you are—behind-the-scenes footage, performer interviews, and techniques designed for your practice.

4

Shape the Future

Interested in embodiment guides? Video courses? Oracle decks? Let us know what you'd use, and you'll get beta access before anyone else.

5

The Reward

Sign up and receive a complimentary tarot reading using the first 5 cards we reveal on launch day. This reading is only available to our early community.

Ready? Your insights matter to us.
Let's begin.
